column31: domain_NON_CYTOPLASMIC_DOMAIN_Region of a membrane-bound protein predicted to be outside the membrane, in the extracellular region.
column35: domain_TRANSMEMBRANE_Region of a membrane-bound protein predicted to be embedded in the membrane.
column36: domain_SIGNAL_PEPTIDE_C_REGION_C-terminal region of a signal peptide.
column44: domain_SIGNAL_PEPTIDE_N_REGION_N-terminal region of a signal peptide.
column45: domain_CYTOPLASMIC_DOMAIN_Region of a membrane-bound protein predicted to be outside the membrane, in the cytoplasm.
